Text:
This show is terrible and completely misses what made the movie funny, but oh well it's something to watch I guess.

 Thanks.
Not so terrible after all, then is it?
Love this funny cartoon! Great episode, Good file, thanks for sharing  :o)
It is kinda terrible I guess but I still like it, I don't think a cartoon could ever compare to the movie but this is a lot better then nothing. At least it has a few of the actors voices lol
